chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Remember, O LORD, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.
items.plainText: Remember, O LORD, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.

items.text: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.
items.plainText: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.

items.text: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.
items.plainText: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.

items.text: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.
items.plainText: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.

items.text: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.
items.plainText: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.

items.text: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
items.plainText: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.

items.text: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.
items.plainText: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.

items.text: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.
items.plainText: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.

items.text: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.
items.plainText: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.

items.text: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.
items.plainText: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.

items.text: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.
items.plainText: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.

items.text: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.
items.plainText: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.

items.text: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
items.plainText: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.

items.text: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.
items.plainText: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.

items.text: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.
items.plainText: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.

items.text: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!
items.plainText: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!

items.text: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.
items.plainText: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.

items.text: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.
items.plainText: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.

items.text: Thou, O LORD, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.
items.plainText: Thou, O LORD, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.

items.text: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?
items.plainText: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?

items.text: Turn thou us unto thee, O LORD, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.
items.plainText: Turn thou us unto thee, O LORD, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.

items.text: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
items.plainText: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
